#text=I was waiting at the bus stop , and as it was a very hot day , I was happy for the shady bench .
#text=More people gathered around the stop , getting on and off other buses , as I waited for my bus to arrive .
#text=Finally , a bus with my number on it , arrived .
#text=It felt a little like a rush to get on , by finally I had paid my fair , and looked for a place to sit .
#text=Not finding a seat , I placed my shopping bag between my feet and stood for a few stops , holding the handhold hanging from the ceiling .
#text=Finally the bus cleared out a little and I was able to find a place to sit .
#text=I read my book , looking occasionally out the windows , and listening for information on the next stop , until finally reaching the stop for home .
#text=Even though I stepped carefully off the bus , I did stumble slightly on one the steps .
#text=I promised myself to be more careful in the future .
